result.purpose: This folder contains templates for reporting bugs and requesting features in a project.
result.architecture: The folder follows a simple configuration pattern, utilizing YAML files to define templates for GitHub issues.

.github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/bug-report.yaml.purpose: Template for reporting bugs in a project
risks: Potential exposure of sensitive information if security issues are reported publicly

.github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/config.yml.purpose: Configuration file for GitHub issue templates

.github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/feature-request.y.purpose: Defines a template for submitting feature requests to the Gin framework.
